name: Prisoner of Luck
description:
Each action: "Jump", "Crouch", "Knock" and "Spit" can ADD or TAKE from your luck. You can do the actions multiple times in a row.

Once - the change is not much. Twice - you risk more.

Don't even try doing them Thrice. You can look at me, it's cursed. It can COMPLETELY FLIP YOUR LUaaCK.

Again, don't try it...Go find a ritual that works for you. Or be a sceptic and die in a ditch, that's an option too.

by TallBoys
